pullrequest.title: Install server fixture for use outside of gazebo.

content.raw:
When I build the example I get:

```
jackie@pol:~/code/gazebo/examples/stand_alone/test_fixture/build$ make -j8
Scanning dependencies of target test
Scanning dependencies of target gtest
[ 33%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/gtest.dir/gtest/src/gtest-all.cc.o
[ 66%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/test.dir/test.cc.o
Linking CXX static library libgtest.a
[ 66%] Built target gtest
Scanning dependencies of target gtest_main
[100%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/gtest_main.dir/gtest/src/gtest_main.cc.o
Linking CXX static library libgtest_main.a
[100%] Built target gtest_main
Linking CXX executable test
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lgtest
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lgtest_main
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [test] Error 1
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/test.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
```

Scanning dependencies of target test
